tigase.auth.impl

Class ScramSPCallbackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tigase.auth.impl.ScramSPCallbackHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CallbackHandler, AuthRepositoryAware, Aware, DomainAware, SessionAware

    public class ScramSPCallbackHandler
extends Object
implements CallbackHandler, AuthRepositoryAware, SessionAware, DomainAware
    Handler for SCRAM with Salted Password.

    Password should be encoded as:

     base64(salt | saltedPassword)

    Where:
    salt - 20 bytes,
    saltedPassword - 20 bytes.
